resources.string: I am a software developer From Kenya Currently a student at the East African University Pursuing a degree in Computer Science, im good in kotlin for android development and also laravel framework for full stack web development. i also explore things concerning cyber security currently at hackerone and intigriti bug bounty programs I also do some machine learning stuff and im currently at kaggle workspace.
What i can do for the company:

If given a chance to work for the company i would make sure the company meets its goals as far as software development is concerned by making sure i develop industry standard software products with hardened security features for the safety of the users
